column1: TABLE 3.G-I SECTORAL BACKGROUND DATA FOR AGRICULTURE
CO2 emissions from liming, urea application and other carbon-containing fertilizers
GREENHOUSE GAS SOURCE AND SINK CATEGORIES
(1) Emissions should include all national liming regardless of land use. A Party should report total estimates for total lime application.

Parties should provide detailed explanations on the agriculture sector in chapter 5: Agriculture (CRF sector 3) of the national inventory report (NIR). Use this documentation box to provide references to relevant sections of the NIR if any additional information and/or further details are needed to understand the content of this table.
